title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

We can win this thing, because we must. Most important thing is to vote and convince others to vote. Democrats are no longer the party of JFK. Conservatives want prosperity, opportunity for everyone. Democrats don't believe in America, don't believe in people. Two competing visions, one seeks to eliminate the United States of America as we know it. All votes matter. Brett Favre and Lil Wayne endorse Trump. Rush runs through encouraging headlines. Conrad Black: We must defeat Democrats, then establishment Republicans. Trafalgar's Cahaly sees shift in youth vote. Trump predicts he will flip Minnesota for first time since 1972. The Rockefeller family comes out against oil. How Rush organizes the Stack of Stuff. McConnell knows how to beat trickery in Kentucky. Biden and Harris have more money than any Dem campaign in history, are running phony campaign, but we can beat it all by voting.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Will there be an October Surprise from the New York Times? Trump supporter doesn't think the (D) next to Biden's name is enough to overcome our enthusiasm and love for President Trump. If Biden wins, he won't be president for more than 6 months. Rush replays the Mega MAGA Radio Rally with President Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3

Rush replays the Mega MAGA Radio Rally with President Trump.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
